text: Ryan Humiston: Horseshoe triceps with reverse curls, 3-second eccentric, 8-12 reps... You're on the right track—keep applying this!
Jeff Nippard: 0-3 RIR maximizes hypertrophy; SpO2 stable in 6-12 reps... Small steps like these build big gains. Keep it up.
Dr. Mike Israetel: HRV <60ms post-set signals overtraining—deload or reduce volume by 20%... Small steps like these build big gains. Keep it up.
